Package controller

Class ModifyAppointmentScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.ModifyAppointmentScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyAppointmentScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is for modifying appointments in the database.

    • receiveAppointment

      public static void receiveAppointment(Appointments modifiableAppointment)
      This method receives an appointment selected from the main screen.
      Parameters:
      modifiableAppointment - is the received appointment form the main screen

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      initialize determines the initial state of the scene when it gets called. Two for loops are used to populate the start and end time combo boxes. The times are converted from eastern to local time as they are added.
      The customers, users, and contacts combo boxes are set with the customers, users, and contacts from the database. All fields, combo boxes and date picker
      are set with the data from the appointment being modified. Variables are initialized with said data.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - points to a uniform resource locator (source: )
      resourceBundle - contains locale-specific objects (source: )

    • customerId

      public void customerId(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method sets the customer ID. The contact from the combo box calls its getCustomerId method.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - calls method a selection from the combo box is made.

    • startTime

      public void startTime(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method sets the start appointment time. The string from the combo box is parsed as a LocalTime object.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - calls method a selection from the combo box is made.

    • endTime

      public void endTime(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)

      actionEvent - calls method a selection from the combo box is made.

    • modifyAppointment

      public void modifyAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      Modifies an appointment in the database.
      Variables are assigned values based on user input from text fields, combo boxes, and a date picker. Input is validated
      for various conditions including length, whether the user entered data, if the date for the appointment is in the future,
      if the end time is after the start time, and if the customer already has an appointment that overlaps. A pop-up or labels
      display to let the user know what to correct. If all criteria is met, the appointment is updated in the database and the user
      is directed back to the main screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - calls method when the save button is pressed.
      Throws:
      SQLException
      IOException

    • toMain

      public void toMain(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method sends users to the main screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - calls method when cancel button is pressed
      Throws:
      IOException
